comments:
When I try to create a websphere 6.0 server through window->preferences->servers->runtime, Once I click next, nothing happens.  An error is created in the log.  
I am using the following zip + dependancies on eclipse Version: 3.2.0:
wtp-sdk-1.5M4.zip
emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.2.0M4.zip
JEM-SDK-1.2M1.zip
GEF-SDK-3.2M4.zip

This was a fresh install, so there should not be any conflicting plugins.

Problem has been solved.  Apparently the xml configurations were not being read properly using java jvm 1.4.1, we switched the JVM to 1.4.2 and things started working properly
